p: In order to verify the specificity of predicted B-cell epitopes, the reactivity against rSHNP, rJHNP, SHNP (G72-D110), SHNP (P251-D264) and SHNP (I266-A283) were tested by ELISA against samples from mice immunized with both recombinant proteins, rSHNP and rJHNP and with non-immunized mice, at dilution of 1:100.
